scripts.deploy: shx --silent mkdir -p ../../../publish/web/editor && shx --silent mkdir -p ../../../publish/web/editor/.next && shx --silent mkdir -p ../../../publish/web/editor/config && shx cp -r config/* ../../../publish/web/editor/config && shx --silent mkdir -p ../../../publish/web/editor/node_modules && shx --silent mkdir -p ../../../publish/web/editor/.next/static && shx cp -r .next/standalone/node_modules/* ../../../publish/web/editor/node_modules && shx cp -r .next/static/* ../../../publish/web/editor/.next/static    && shx cp -r .next/standalone/packages/doceditor/.next/* ../../../publish/web/editor/.next &&  shx cp -f server.prod.js ../../../publish/web/editor/server.js
